statements: SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, earnings FROM influencers WHERE partnership_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE earnings > 1000 ORDER BY partnership_date DESC
SELECT influencer_id, name, performance_metrics->'followers' AS followers FROM influencers
SELECT AVG(earnings) AS average_earnings FROM influencers
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE earnings > 1000 ORDER BY partnership_date DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT influencer_id, name, partnership_date FROM influencers WHERE name LIKE '%Kim%'
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE performance_metrics->'engagement_rate' > 0.05
SELECT influencer_id, name, DATE_FORMAT(partnership_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS partnership_date_formatted FROM influencers WHERE earnings < 5000
SELECT JSON_VALUE(performance_metrics, '$.followers') AS followers_count FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM Partnerships;
SELECT partnership_id, influencer_id, brand_id, payment_amount FROM Partnerships ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE influencer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Partnerships WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_id, MAX(payment_amount) FROM Partnerships GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT * FROM Partnerships WHERE partnership_id = 1;
SELECT brand_id, payment_amount FROM Partnerships WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Partnerships WHERE payment_amount > 500.00;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM Partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT p.*, pm.metric_value FROM Partnerships p INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics pm ON p.influencer_id = pm.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM partnerships ORDER BY partnership_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, influencer_id FROM partnerships WHERE influencer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM earnings WHERE earnings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY earnings_amount DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, followers_count FROM performance_metrics WHERE followers_count < 5000;
SELECT brand_name, partnership_date FROM partnerships WHERE partnership_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM partnerships WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, partnership_date FROM partnerships WHERE partnership_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(earnings_amount) AS total_earnings FROM earnings GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_id, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE followers_count > 5000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT brand_name, payment_date FROM partnerships JOIN earnings ON partnerships.influencer_id = earnings.influencer_id WHERE earnings_amount > 1000 AND payment_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Partnerships;
SELECT partnership_id, partner_name FROM Partnerships;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS partnership_count FROM Partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM Earnings WHERE earnings > 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Partnerships WHERE partner_name = 'ABC Corp' AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON Influencers.influencer_id = PerformanceMetrics.influencer_id;
SELECT MAX(earnings) AS max_earnings FROM Earnings;
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(earnings) AS total_earnings FROM Influencers JOIN Earnings ON Influencers.influencer_id = Earnings.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name;
SELECT partnership_id, influencer_name, start_date, end_date FROM Partnerships JOIN Influencers ON Partnerships.influencer_id = Influencers.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM partnerships WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT partnership_id, influencer_id, brand_id FROM partnerships ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT earning_id, SUM(earnings_amount) AS total_earnings FROM earnings GROUP BY earning_id ORDER BY total_earnings DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, email FROM influencers WHERE influencer_name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM partnerships WHERE end_date IS NULL
SELECT influencer_name, brand_name FROM influencers JOIN partnerships ON influencers.influencer_id = partnerships.influencer_id JOIN brands ON brands.brand_id = partnerships.brand_id
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(earnings_amount) AS total_earnings FROM influencers JOIN earnings ON influencers.influencer_id = earnings.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name
SELECT brand_name, MAX(followers) AS max_followers FROM brands JOIN performance_metrics ON brands.brand_id = performance_metrics.influencer_id GROUP BY brand_name

SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate, post_count FROM influencers JOIN performance_metrics ON influencers.influencer_id = performance_metrics.influencer_id WHERE engagement_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY post_count DESC
